sentences.sContent: If left untreated, it may lead to corneal abrasions, corneal scarring, microbial keratitis, and loss of vision.
sentences.sContent_eng: If left untreated, it may lead to corneal abrasions, corneal scarring, microbial keratitis, and loss of vision.
sentences.sCn: 若不治疗，它可能会导致角膜擦伤，角膜瘢痕，微生物性角膜炎，甚至失明。

sentences.sContent: Herpes simplex keratitis can occur in the context of primary herpes simplex virus infection but is observed more frequently in secondary or recurrent disease.
sentences.sContent_eng: Herpes simplex keratitis can occur in the context of primary herpes simplex virus infection but is observed more frequently in secondary or recurrent disease.
sentences.sCn: 单纯疱疹性角膜炎可以原发性单纯疱疹病毒感染的形式发生，但其一般常继发于其它疾病或反复发作。

words.tran: 角膜移植术；[眼科] 角膜成形术
